ady Holiday Hlath was the heiress of the noble patriar Hlath family of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
By the , Lord Orthagon was already an old man who was the leader of the family only symbolically. His matron daughter, Merrigold Hlath was making all financial and social family discussions in Orthagons place. When the Absolute crisis arrived to the Gate, Orthagon Hlath was noted by the Cult of Bane as a vulnerable patriar through his beloved grand-neice Holiday, a young woman of insatiable gabling habits and an impressive collection of debts from all gambling dens between Stonyeyes and Sows Foot neighborhoods.
